languages.text: "Надеюсь, Дом Орселлио перенесет полученный удар. Разом лишиться станции и множества слуг — тяжелое испытание".
"I hope House Orsellio will survive this heavy blow. Losing a station and many servants all at once is a difficult trial."
languages.original_text: "Надеюсь, Дом Орселлио перенесет полученный удар. Разом лишиться станции и множества слуг — тяжелое испытание".

traits.locale_text: "I hope House Orsellio will survive this heavy blow. Losing a station and many servants all at once is a difficult trial."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I hope House Orsellio will survive this heavy blow. Losing a station and many servants all at once is a difficult trial."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I hope House Orsellio will survive this heavy blow. Losing a station and many servants all at once is a difficult trial."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I hope House Orsellio will survive this heavy blow. Losing a station and many servants all at once is a difficult trial."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我希望奥赛罗家族能顺利度过这场沉重的打击。失去了一座星站，还失去了众多仆人，这会是场艰难的考验。”
languages.original_text: "I hope House Orsellio will survive this heavy blow. Losing a station and many servants all at once is a difficult trial."

traits.locale_text: “我希望奥塞罗家族能顺利度过这场沉重的打击。失去了一座星站，还失去了众多仆人，这会是场艰难的考验。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « J'espère que la maison Orsellio va se remettre de cette épreuve. Perdre une station et autant de serviteurs d'un coup... »
languages.original_text: "I hope House Orsellio will survive this heavy blow. Losing a station and many servants all at once is a difficult trial."

traits.locale_text: « J'espère que la maison Orsellio va se remettre de cette épreuve. Perdre une station et autant de serviteurs d'un coup... »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Hoffentlich kann Haus Orsellio diesen schweren Schlag überleben. Eine Station und gleichzeitig so viele Diener zu verlieren, das ist eine schwierige Prüfung."
languages.original_text: "I hope House Orsellio will survive this heavy blow. Losing a station and many servants all at once is a difficult trial."

traits.locale_text: "Hoffentlich kann Haus Orsellio diesen schweren Schlag überleben. Eine Station und gleichzeitig so viele Diener zu verlieren, das ist eine schwierige Prüfung."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「オーセリオ家にはこの深刻な打撃を切り抜けてもらいたい。ステーションと多くの従者を一度に失うとは、厳しい試練だ」
languages.original_text: "I hope House Orsellio will survive this heavy blow. Losing a station and many servants all at once is a difficult trial."

traits.locale_text: 「オーセリオ家にはこの深刻な打撃を切り抜けてもらいたい。ステーションと多くの従者を一度に失うとは、厳しい試練だ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Espero que la casa Orsellio sobreviva a este duro golpe. Perder una estación y tantos sirvientes a la vez es un revés considerable».
languages.original_text: "I hope House Orsellio will survive this heavy blow. Losing a station and many servants all at once is a difficult trial."

traits.locale_text: «Espero que la casa Orsellio sobreviva a este duro golpe. Perder una estación y tantos sirvientes a la vez es un revés considerable».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "I hope House Orsellio will survive this heavy blow. Losing a station and many servants all at once is a difficult trial."

languages.text: "Ümidim, Orsellio Hanesi'nin bu darbeye karşı direnebilmesidir. Aynı anda hem bir istasyonu hem de birçok hizmetkârı kaybetmek oldukça güç olur."
languages.original_text: "I hope House Orsellio will survive this heavy blow. Losing a station and many servants all at once is a difficult trial."

traits.locale_text: "Ümidim, Orsellio Hanesi'nin bu darbeye karşı direnebilmesidir. Aynı anda hem bir istasyonu hem de birçok hizmetkârı kaybetmek oldukça güç olur."
